property.name: Parent
property.tp:docstring: The object path of the parent device.

property.name: InputFlags
property.tp:docstring: The expected set of GRE flags for incoming packets. (The values are specified by the GRE specification. On Linux, they are defined in <linux/if_tunnel.h>. Eg, GRE_KEY for the 'Key Present' bit.)

property.name: OutputFlags
property.tp:docstring: The set of GRE flags to use for outgoing packets. (The values are specified by the GRE specification. On Linux, they are defined in <linux/if_tunnel.h>. Eg, GRE_KEY for the 'Key Present' bit.)

property.name: InputKey
property.tp:docstring: Expected input key (if the "Key Present" bit is set in the input flags).

property.name: OutputKey
property.tp:docstring: Output key (if the "Key Present" bit is set in the output flags).

property.name: Local
property.tp:docstring: The local end of the tunnel.

property.name: Remote
property.tp:docstring: The remote end of the tunnel.

property.name: Ttl
property.tp:docstring: The value to use in the IP TTL field for tunnel packets.

property.name: Tos
property.tp:docstring: The value to use in the IP ToS field for tunnel packets.

property.name: PathMtuDiscovery
property.tp:docstring: Whether path MTU discovery is performed.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
